abstract: Langerhans-cell histiocytosis is characterized by abnormal proliferation of Langerhans cells, and frequently associated with cigarette smoking. A 24-year-old man who underwent excisional biopsy of a pulmonary nodule and segmental rib resection was found to have the eosinophilic granuloma variation of Langerhans-cell histiocytosis.
title: Eosinophilic granuloma of the lung and rib.
